skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.

abilities.name: Raiko's first lieutenant
abilities.description: Increases 50% of DMG dealt when one of the Four Heavenly Kings of Raiko is on the team.

700.name: Ogetsu Hime [Gula]
700.description:
"Hoho♪　Curry is my signature dish! "
She is the goddess of food - one of the pillars of the Shinto religion of Japan. She is the twin sister of "Uke Mochi" and in terms of her lineage, she is actually older than the three noble children. She is an elder god who is directly related to Izanagi and Izanami. She apparently had an altercation with Susanoo but now she would only casually dismiss it by saying, "Well, a lot of things had happened back when I was young" and she doesn't seem to take it to heart (at least on her part). She is very homely by nature and is willing to give everything for the sake of family. As soon as one makes the request, she would receive the guest with food she has personally prepared. The strange thing is, the dining table would be covered with dishes and no one has any idea when she has cooked all that food. That said, most spirits only care about being able to taste her delicious dishes and seldom spare a second thought to such triviality. And thus, they'd simply overlook the bizarre circumstance. And in case anyone ever wonders about it, her signature dish is just..."cooking." You'd be better off by directing your attention elsewhere, seriously.
[Event] The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!

skill.name: The bentou of love from wife
skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.

abilities.name: Goddess of food
abilities.description: Increases 10% of Crit Rate and increases 15% Crit DMG

from_description.event_name: The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!

701.name: Sæhrímnir
701.description:
"I'll do my best...for the sake of seeing a smile on everyone's face! "
A legendary boar in Norse Mythology that has been slaughtered countless times and prepared as food. She has the special ability to turn anything into premium A5-grade meat. When it comes to meat dishes, her culinary skills are second to none. She can prepare meat of any doneness, from medium rare to well done, with perfection and has thus been known as the "divine cook." She is joyful and warm-hearted by nature and as long as she knows that she could bring a smile to the person eating her dish, nothing would ever be too hard or difficult for her. She is the type that any man would dream to have as his wife. Her only flaw is her pre-disposition to get into situations that cause her to split hairs; once she has made up her mind, there's no way to talk her out of it.
[Event] The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!

skill.name: Well done
skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.

abilities.name: Beast of Compassion
abilities.description: Reduces 40% of DMG taken at the start of the final wave.

from_description.event_name: The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!

702.name: Dagda's Cauldron
702.description:
"First, have a taste of the soup!　Then try the noodles!　Ah! If you want seasonings, you can only have it with your second bowl! "
A spirit transformed from a wondrous cauldron from Celtic mythology; apparently one only has to pray to it and the cauldron will give any food that he/she so desires. She has the gifts as a genius chef. Any dish that needs to be prepared in a pot or cauldron, be it soup or noodles of any kind, she will be able to re-create it, regardless of how old/new/exotic the recipe is. She is most well-known for re-creating the ultimate ramen - the signature dish of "Tientien Ken" that was once thought to be gone from the world when the recipe was lost. The story is so wide spread that no one in the circle of spirit culinary hasn't heard her name. However, if you praise her too much, she would forget herself and become very cocky. When this happens, you'd have to eat exactly the way she demands you to. When it's a stubborn old geezer that does this to you, you will probably get upset; but she has the look of an innocent little girl, so some may actually consider this as an added bonus in a twisted sense...
[Event] The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!

skill.name: Imperial Feast
skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.

from_description.event_name: The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!

703.name: Thor
703.description:
"No one has taken a hit from my hammer and lived to tell the tale! "
A spirit transformed from the God of Thunder who is one of the key deities in Norse Mythology. A conceited, mischievous brat with a huge ego; he is the type that will never relent unless he comes in first. Despite his youthful appearance, he has the power and might that make him worthy of his title as the God of Thunder. If he feels like it, he can easily take on other gods and hold his own. That's how powerful he is. He is the partner of Mjölnir, who happens to be a miser with a penchant to coax him to do silly things that get him into trouble... After all, a teenage boy in puberty is utterly defenseless before a woman with a great pair of knockers. On an unrelated note, even though he is a competitive eater, he is a stickler to principles and will only accept the ways of eating that catch his fancy.
[Event] The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!

skill.name: Hammer of the Thunder God
skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the row of enemies directly in front, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.

abilities.name: The Gourmet
abilities.description: Absorbs a 25% of DMG dealt as HP.

from_description.event_name: The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!

704.name: Mito Mitsukuni
704.description:
"Oh, I am helpless when it comes to anything that is novel! "
A spirit transformed from the famed and beloved Vice-Shogun who compiled the Dai Nihonshi. She is an energetic high school student who has a penchant for all things new and novel (by appearance). Due to the powerful influence of her portrayal in the period drama, after she became a spirit and took on the appearance of a girl, she still speaks like an old man. Apparently, some habits just die harder than others. She is crafty, clever and a tactician by nature. Not only that, she is also incredibly gifted in her rhetoric, so much so that even Shogun Yoshimune didn't stand a chance against her in a duel of words. Given the fact that flashing her inro has failed to surprise anyone as of late, she is thinking of other ways to bring back the surprise element... On an unrelated note, she is also famous for being allegedly the first person in Japan to have tasted ramen.
[Event] The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!

skill.name: The most power aide CODE-SUKE
skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP, with a {probability} of inflicting Silence.

abilities.name: The heart of curiosity
abilities.description: Increases 15% of the skill DMG of all ranged allies

from_description.event_name: The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!

705.name: Deus Ex Machina
705.description:
"Affirming a hostile response at 20 degrees from port side; eliminate the target. "
Originating from a convention in Greek tragedy, it transformed into a spirit from its literal meaning of "god from the machine" in a conversion of concepts. She is powered by a core generator of a perpetual machine and is capable of converting any material or substance into energy. Her power and strength will vary depending on the source of energy she taps from. Since there is theoretically no limit to the energy she can convert, given the right circumstances she could possibly become the most power spirit of all spirits. As she was created as a machine, she is skilled at computation and seems to have the ability to quantify all events for analysis. Conversely, she has little knowledge in her capacity to process emotions and feelings. And since she talks like a robot, she has often been perceived as hopelessly useless. This has perplexed her greatly...
[Event] The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!

skill.name: The invisible hand of god
skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies. Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.

abilities.name: Perpetual machine
abilities.description: Increases 1% of Max HP to Anima team members at the start of each wave.

from_description.event_name: The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!

706.name: Beelzebub [Gula]
706.description:
"You've got a long way to go to even have the slightest chance of beating me as a competitive eater! "
A spirit transformed from the demon of gluttony - one of the seven lords of Hell. As the sin she stands for, she is unmatched when it comes to eating. She is the main culprit that has brought the untime end of famous eating competitions and speed eating events. But that alone wasn't enough to satisfy her; she is also infamous for involving herself in every eating competition organized by restaurants and turning them into utter mess, thereby causing countless restaurants to go out of business..... evil, just as one would expect from a demon. By the way, her age old problem of body odor seems to have been resolved with the fragrance that Star of Bethlehem has given her as a present, and that has put her in a wondrous mood recently.
[Event] The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!

skill.name: Crimson wings
skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 3 enemies with the highest ATK. Targets receive {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.

abilities.name: Female champion in competitive eating
abilities.description: Increases 20% of skill DMG of Phantasma team members.

abilities.name: Wolfing
abilities.description: Increases 30% of the ATK speed of all allies at the start of the final wave.

from_description.event_name: The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!

707.name: Toyouke-Omikami
707.description:
"To eat is the basis of life; do not treat it so casually. "
One of the gods of creation that is responsible for the origins of food. She is the mother of "Ogetsuhime", "Uke Mochi" and "Inari Okami" - a major deity who protects Japan. Originally created as a kingdom of volcano that had nothing but barren lands, Japan is able to evolve into a country of abundance with plenty of food for all only because of her blessings. In her youth, she descended into the mortal world for a shower but her divine robes were concealed by man. This caused her to have to spend a considerable period of time living amongst mankind. During that period, she has gotten to learn the ugly and beautiful aspects of humanity and she made up her mind to be a guide for man and lead them on the right path by being strict or benevolent when the occasion calls for it. Despite her mellow temperaments, she is cool-headed and dignified. In a chaotic event like an eating competition whereby all sorts of characters come together, it wouldn't be an exaggeration to say that it is all thanks to her that the event could proceed at all with some sort of order.
[Event] The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!

skill.name: Oomonoimi
skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.

abilities.name: Legend of the heavenly robes
abilities.description: Increases 50% of Skill DMG.

abilities.name: Primordial god of food
abilities.description: Increases 50% of Crit DMG.

from_description.event_name: The Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits!

708.name: Stella: Auriga
708.description:
"One day, I shall become a powerful man and surpass Lady Cassiopeia! "
A spirit transformed from one of the Ptolemy 48 constellations. The secretary of the Empress Cassiopeia, he is a sharp-witted and observant lad. He has tremendous respect for Cassiopeia as the highest commander of the fleet. But after witnessing the way she leads her disorganized and unruly personal life, he was consumed with a burning desire and a sense of mission to help Cassiopeia. He had wanted to ask Cassiopeia to instruct him in the skills of sword play and military tactics, but he quickly realized that the only things he had gotten better at were domestic tasks such as cooking, doing laundry and so forth. This has vexed him greatly. Although he isn't sure if he should continue to do it, he can't help responding to Cassiopeia's requests.

skill.name: Leadership skills
skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.

abilities.name: The all-purpose aide
abilities.description: Increases 20% of the EXP gained from battle.(only take effect once to the team)

709.name: Behemoth [Gula]
709.description:
"Never thought our paths would cross again──! "
A spirit transformed from the monstrosity that embodies gluttonous eating. She is an energetic and curious girl and has trouble staying still or settling down. In other words, she is a troublemaker who creates problems everywhere she goes. During the last Halloween, she developed romantic feelings for the protagonist and semi-coerced him to participate in the "Definitive Eating Competition for Spirits." Since she is always hungry, she is never able to access her full power due to the lack of energy. But it is said when she gets serious, her terrible power could destroy the world. By the way, she seems to be a distant relative of the Leviathan...and the connection seems to be evident from the way they both create problems and troubles for others.

skill.name: Bahamut of the End
skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK. Targets receives {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.

710.name: Chronos
710.description:
"To be a man……is to be able to narrate a story through his deeds……"
The leader of the Titans who gave to the Olympian Gods; the father of Hades, Zeus, Hera and Hestia. Taciturn and succinct, he is an obstinate father figure who will never back down once he has made up his mind. The conflict between him and his son Zeus in the past almost led to the annihilation of the world. In addition, he is an old acquaintance of Adamant Sickle, as both believe that no one knows them better than one another. Considering that he would always get into a fight whenever Zeus is around, the two have made a conscious effort to avoid each other.

skill.name: Wrath of the Earth
skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.

abilities.name: Obstinate old man
abilities.description: Increases own level by 10.

abilities.name: Father of Gods
abilities.description: Increases 20% of skill DMG by Divina team members.(only take effect once to the team)

711.name: Mitsu Aoi Inro
711.description:
"My Komon is really something, isn't she! "
A spirit transformed from the famous container "Mitsu Aoi Inro" that has appeared numerous times in the period drama of Mito Komon. She is the confidant of Mito Mitsukuni and adores Mitsukuni above all else. In fact, she is actually overprotective of Mitsukuni. Coupled with the fact that she is a natural busybody, she treats Mitsukuni like a mother who can't bear to be separated from her child despite the two being of the same age. In the beginning, Mitsukuni wasn't able to deal with the way she acts but as of late, she seems to have given up and would simply let her rattle on and on about how great Mitsukuni is... The truth is, she has a dangerous side to her that is unknown to all - the determination to do even the worst of dirty jobs if it were for the sake of Mitsukuni……

skill.name: Inro flash
skill.description: Reduces all enemies' DEF by {delay1} for a limited time.

abilities.name: The crest of aoi
abilities.description: Increases 20% of Max HP and Reduces 20% of DMG taken.

712.name: Civet Musk
712.description:
"I like everything, be it insects, flowers and animals. The only thing I dislike is human. "
A spirit transformed from the precious spice harvested from civets. She is the key ingredient of that world-renown bottle of fragrance and everyone has heard of her name. She has materialized as a graceful prophet in this world. She is arrogant and xenophobic - anyone whom she meets for the first time would probably get the cold shoulder and snotty treatment from her. But if you were to listen to what she has to say more closely, you will realize that her blunt delivery of the truth has been for the sake of that person. Once you get to truly know her temperaments, your impression of her will change dramatically and realize that she is actually just a girl who is not very good at socializing with others. And if you ever say anything good about her trademark cat ears, she would always blush and conceal them.

skill.name: Offensive fragrance
skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to enemy with highest ATK, target receives {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.

abilities.name: Aphrodisiac
abilities.description: Reduces 10% DMG dealt by all foes at the start of each wave.

abilities.name: Aromas of seven spices
abilities.description: Increases 10% of skill DMG dealt at the start of each wave.

713.name: Xiahou Dun
713.description:
"Gahahaha!　You wish to fight me, kid? "
A spirit transformed from the one-eyed, fearless warrior who was the cousin of warlord Cao Cao. He is mostly known for his fiery temperament and passion for battle and he has been one of the earliest supporters of Cao Cao when he was still a fledging military leader. Cao Cao trusted him deeply and even told him that he can skip the formalities and etiquettes that would be otherwise required for Cao's subjects. As he is fiercely loyal and upholds friendship, he is admired and respected by his subordinates and perceived as the ideal commander to follow. He also has had a bit of history with Guan Yu. When Guan Yu decided to leave Cao Cao, he was the one to pursue Guan Yu until the very end and this has become a popular story in folklore. Even after becoming a spirit, he would often duel with Guan Yu. But apparently the two haven't determined who is the better fighter.

skill.name: Fiery halberd
skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.

abilities.name: Hot-blooded man
abilities.description: Increases 10% of DMG dealt; Increases 10% of skill DMG.

714.name: Vepar
714.description:
"Rage is very similar to a storm. They both appear without any sign or warning but when you become aware of it, it is already gone……"
A spirit transformed from the Great Duke of Hell that governs 29 Legions of Hell. She is a demon who takes the form of a mermaid with the ability to control water. She can freely transform her feet into her tailfin as she wishes and can easily move about when she is on land. At the first glance, she will appear as a simple, pretty and elegant lady. But the truth is, she has an extremely short temper over even the most trivial things and when she becomes enraged, she can summon a terrible storm that can flood an entire region. She would reflect on her misdeeds afterward, but such reflection usually takes the tone of "Oh well, it can't be helped now that it has happened," and it only causes greater irritation and contempt from others. It is of utmost importance to pay careful attention at all times when conversing with her in order to prevent pushing her buttons inadvertently.

skill.name: The unreasonable tempest
skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (ranged priority).

abilities.name: Devil of the ocean
abilities.description: Increases 20% of Crit DMG by Phantasma team members.

715.name: Stella: Cetus
715.description:
"Gwaaaaooohh──! "
A spirit transformed from one of the Ptolemy 48 constellations. She is a space monster with an immense body and terrorizes the universe wherever she goes. Because of her unfathomable powers of destruction, she has been feared and revered as a god of destruction. With the ability to regenerate any wound she sustains in a matter of seconds, she has astounding regenerative capability and when she lets loose her roar, the sheer power of the sound can obliterate even planets and stars. And as such, she has been perceived as an existence that can never be conquered. Although she can't speak, she would get angry when anyone is foolish enough to badmouth her. This also means she seems to be able to understand the language of human beings. With no hope of ever defeating her, mankind felt that at the very least, attempts should be made to communicate with her so that a consensus on coexistence can be struck with her. Thus far, numerous brave souls have tried talking to her but none has succeeded to date. There has only ever been one man - the young warrior Perseus, who allegedly has had an encounter with her that can be said as a conversation. But no one can attest to the truth of such rumor.
[Event] Guild Conquest

732.name: 10eb150
732.description:
"Your path……must be created with your own strength nyan! !"
A spirit transformed from a renowned blade with many legends and stories. During her involvement in the incident with Sola and company, she gained the ability to control powers that are directly opposite to her own and evolved into "Divine Blade." The experiences also enabled her spirit to grow and mature. Her confidence and unwavering belief in herself became the source of her strengths. The fact that she is capable of striking at an opponent's weak spot at any time alone already makes her a formidable opponent; yet her most deadly power lies in her command of the hybrid force of divinity and demons to execute an "Absolute Cleave." There is nothing in existence that can withstand her slash. Apparently it is akin to gambling with your life if you ever point a cat teaser in her general direction.
[Event] Clavicle of the King

skill.name: Flash of Divinity and Demon
skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 enemies (ranged priority).

abilities.name: Divine Blade
abilities.description: Increases 15% of skill DMG to Anima team members at the start of each wave.

733.name: 7eab2e5
733.description:
"I shall wager my everything with this move!"
A spirit transformed from the Captain of the 1st unit of Shinsengumi's - which was a faction of swordsmen who protected Kyoto during the Bakumatsu Era. After his infusion with the soul of Okita Soji, he awakened the true power that laid dormant in his body and attained the level of "God of Sword." With his newly awakened power of "Temporal Jump," he can circumvent the process of "cutting" and directly go to the result of "slashing his opponent." The speed of his sword flash is beyond imagination. Not only that, his movements have also become as smooth and seamless as the flow of water; he can easily parry any attacks made against him and unless one has attained the state of seeing with his/her mind's eye, his/her attack wouldn't even be able to find its target. Nevertheless, his infusion also exacerbated his illness and now he can only fight at his full power for no longer than 3 minutes. But even so, it is said that there are less than five individuals in this world who can last for longer than a minute in a fight against him... Still, he is training just as diligently as ever on a daily basis, and perhaps that's what makes him "a genius at diligent training".
[Event] Clavicle of the King

skill.name: Ultimate Secret Sword ─ Empty Death─
skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK.

abilities.name: God of Sword
abilities.description: Increases 15% of skill DMG by Divina team members at the start of each wave.

734.name: 53e5f4a
734.description:
"I can definitely do better than this! This will not stop me in my path!"
A spirit transformed from the capable lieutenant of Shuten Doji. He is also said to be the incarnation of the Demon General who will be the next leader of all demons. Because of his passion for railways and the profound sentiments of camaraderie with his companions, he was able to evolve into "Demon God" - gaining incredible powers that make him an equal to Shuten Doji. In addition to that, due to the numerous campaigns and missions he took part, his talents and competence as a commander finally bloomed as he attained the ability of "Conqueror" - a talent that augments the strength of his troops by multifold when under his command. Although he still has a penchant for easily getting carried away and fond of women, he has recently learned to behave himself when Hoshikuma Doji gets the upper hand... Although the two have denied having feelings for one another, one really can't help feeling that they act and behave as if they have been couples for an extremely long time...
[Event] Clavicle of the King

skill.name: Kishingeki ─ Rain of May─
skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies.

abilities.name: Conqueror
abilities.description: Increases 25% of Crit Rate by Phantasma team members when this daemon is Team Leader.

abilities.name: Kishin
abilities.description: Increases 15% of skill DMG of Phantasma team members at the start of each wave.

735.name: 94c9c16
735.description:
"I don't really care for any of those trivial things, as long as you pay up."
A spirit transformed from the famous boatman who ferries souls of the dead across Styx and answers to Hades directly. As far as she is concerned, anything in the Underworld can be solved with money. As long as one can afford her fees, no principles or guidelines will apply to her. She is a professional navigator who gets the job done. She charges on an hourly basis and she accepts various payments including rokumonsen, one obol or electronic currency. When asked about her infatuation with money, her response was: "Because my dream is to one day travel around the world." As inspiring as her goal is, given the ten of thousands of dead who go to the Underworld each day, will she actually be able to take such a long leave? And by the way, she is an old friend of Orpheus. Once she ditched her job just because she wanted to hear him play his harp and she was severely reprimanded by Hades as a result.
[Event] Clavicle of the King

skill.name: Sanzu River
skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.

abilities.name: Guide of the Underworld
abilities.description: Increases 25% of the number of soulstones received from battle.

736.name: 7124b26
736.description:
"Why waste time thinking when you just don't have the brain power for the job?"
A spirit transformed from the finest even among the best katanas that have been recognized as Saijo Owazamono. Frivolous and cocky by nature, he has a bad habit of getting out of control whenever he gets excited. He is very close to his partner Kondo Isami and nothing is taboo between the two. Sometimes Isami would catch a glimpse of him feeling down for having said something over the top... Even so, he is deeply trusted by Isami, who was on the record for saying, "It is all thanks to Kotetsu that I was able to get out of the Ikedaya incident unscathed." On a related note, he and Kashuu Kiyomitsu and others have been old acquaintances and the true reason that Isami emerged from the incident without injury was because they got careless. And as such, he feels slightly awkward in their presence.
[Event] Clavicle of the King

skill.name: The Killing Blow
skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (ranged priority).

abilities.name: Katana of Might
abilities.description: Reduces 10% of DMG taken and Increases DMG dealt by 20% at the same time.

737.name: bf08ac1
737.description:
"Well if it is a request from you, I guess I have got to take it seriously."
A spirit transformed from the tricky fox demon who commands both the powers of good and ill fortune. Apt at gathering intel, you can count on his to always have the latest intelligence. He is very close with the Sakuma Clan. Despite being thought by everyone to possess enormous power, he would easily give up a fight even against a much weaker opponent as he doesn't think it's worth the effort. Consequently, he has been overly underestimated in this world. But he doesn't seem to care about what others feel about his and he has gone on the record for saying, "I'd rather be treated with contempt by the weak if that saves me from having to show the ace in my sleeve." And thus, no one has actually witness his power.
[Event] Clavicle of the King

skill.name: Itsuna Saburou
skill.description: Increases all allies' DEF by {delay1} for a limited time.

abilities.name: Spy
abilities.description: Decreases 15% the ATK speed of all foes.

738.name: 9ebe47c
738.description:
"Make your choice; serve me, or die……"
A spirit transformed from the legendary warlord, politician and hero who has left the world with incredible literary works as his legacy. The true leader of the Clavicle of the King; he is the mastermind who wishes to free spirits from the control of mankind. To achieve his ambition, he has spent years in meticulous planning and preparation. In fact, even the past encounters he has had were simply part of his stratagem. He was the cruel and merciless tyrant who once love mankind more than anyone else but ended up being responsible for the deaths of most men in history. Just what exactly he sees through his dark, burning pupils ...nobody will ever know.
[Event] Clavicle of the King

skill.name: Blade of Ruinous Seven Stars
skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 2 enemies with the highest ATK. Targets deal {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.

abilities.description: Increases Crit DMG of 2 Phantasma team members by 25% at the start of each wave.

abilities.name: Mastermind
abilities.description: Increases 20% of DMG dealt by Phantasma team members at the start of the final wave.

739.name: 4656f4b
739.description:
"Alright, pull yourself together already!"
The Director of the Bureau of the Occult and the young mistress of the Tsuchimikado Clan. Borrowing the power of Senji Ryakketsu, she merged with Shuten Doji and become the ultimate entity - a "joker" that commands power beyond the comprehension of human wisdom. Born with the most powerful spirit essence ever gifted to heirs of the Tsuchimikado Clan, she led a secluded life from the mortal world and grew up with spirits and demons instead. As a result, she has grown to see spirits and demons as equals to mankind. Because of this, she secretly developed a method of manifestation that is unrestricted by karma and named her technique as "Karmic Liberation" - giving life to numerous spirits who could live in freedom. Her greatest wish is to create a world where humans, spirits and demons can live in peace, harmony and joy. Nevertheless, for spirit agents who use and order demons as tools and soldiers, her ideas are nothing short of radical and out of the box. Will the concept and vision of a world of inclusion and harmony be accepted by mankind? The answer is still out there.
[Event] Clavicle of the King

skill.name: Sword of Protection/Blade of Annihilation
skill.description: Increases the DMG of 2 allies with the highest ATK by {delay1} for a limited time.

abilities.name: Karmic Liberation
abilities.description: Increases 25% of Crit DMG by the 2 allies with the highest ATK at the start of every wave.

abilities.name: Director of the Bureau of the Occult
abilities.description: Increases skill DMG of all team members by 45% when this daemon is Team Leader.

740.name: 772a4bf
740.description:
"It's been so long since my last fight. Don't blame me if I have forgotten how to pull my punches."
A spirit transformed from the most powerful entity that is the leader figure for all spirits and demons in Japan. He was once the mighty demon that brought terror unto this world from his lair at Mount Oe. However, he was put into an extended slumber due to Minamoto no Yorimitsu's clever ambush. When he manifested in the modern days, his terrible grudge drove him to exact his revenge on mankind but was utterly humbled by Tsuchimikado Mikado as he finally tasted defeat. Just as he thought he would be put to a long slumber, he was surprised by the fact that Mikado had not sealed him away and instead chose to befriend him. This period of placid serenity helped him to find peace within his heart. Even though he can't find it in himself to show his true feelings in the presence of Mikado, he is extremely loyal to her and will even willingly give up his life for her sake. And it is thanks to Mikado that he managed to see heart to heart with Dojigiri Yasutsuna, his once sworn enemy...

skill.name: Psalm of Destructive Sin
skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to enemy with highest ATK, target receives {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.

abilities.name: Deputy Director of the Bureau of the Occult
abilities.description: Increases 25% of skill DMG of the 2 allies with highest ATK.

abilities.name: Demon King
abilities.description: Increases 10% of DMG of Phantasma team members at the start of each wave.

741.name: fb83a99
741.description:
"What's this? How did that adorable little darling ended up being such an old hag……"
A spirit transformed from the oldest tome of divination in Japan that has been passed down as a family heirloom in the Tsuchimikado Clan. With the spirit of Abe no Seimei residing in the tome, she has been taking care of Mikado ever since she was a little girl and reverted to her true form as a tome when she matured. She is one of the very few spirits that truly understands the inner workings of the world through techniques of divination and the truth behind the existence of spirits. Despite appearing to be a loquacious individual who has trouble keeping her mouth shut, she is actually cunningly diverting the subject with useless trivial talks so that she never has to impart what really matters. In other words, she achieves her silence through ceaselessly talking. No one has greater confidence in Mikado's potentials and strengths than her and whenever Mikado finds herself in crisis, she would break her seal and manifest in the world.

skill.name: Qimen Dunjia Formation
skill.description: Restores {value} HP to ally with the highest ATK. Targets deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.

abilities.name: Impeccable Visage
abilities.description: Reduces 15% of DMG taken of all team members; increases 20% of ATK speed at the start of the final wave.

abilities.name: Da Liu Ren
abilities.description: Increases 43% of crit rate and increases 100% of crit DMG of skill targets at the same time.

742.name: 57e8f37
742.description:
"Here's a song for you to keep you entertained!"
A spirit transformed from the goddess of dance and performance in Japanese mythology. She is the oldest dancer in the history of Japan and it is said that all who see her dance would become captivated by her performance. According to rumor, her latest goal is to become an idol who can sing as well as she can dance but apparently her progress in singing has not improved by the slightest. Only heaven knows if the day she becomes an idol would ever come. She is also one of the best friends of Cherry Blossom Front from the same agency. But as flowers don't bloom in the Underworld, Cherry Blossom Front would be entirely useless, and thus she has taken Cherry Blossom Front's place in this incident. And lastly, she is still on bad terms with Goddess Amaterasu...

skill.name: Song of Angel
skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.

abilities.name: Goddess of Performance
abilities.description: Increases 10% of the EXP gained from battle and increases 10% of battle reward drop rate.(only take effect once to the team)

743.name: 21af77d
743.description:
"Hohoho!　How did you like that? Very sexy right?"
This is the true form of the spirit transformed from the princess of the moon when she unleashes her true powers. When her stores of lunar energy reach the maximum, she will be able to maintain this form for 5 minutes. Her true identity is an extraterrestrial demon lord who has been banished to this dimension to atone for her sins. She has the ability to manipulate gravity; she doesn't age and will never die. However, such powers are sealed off completely when she is in the form of a child. If she really wishes to, she could easily turn Earth into a black hole without breaking a sweat. But now that she has befriended other spirits, she no longer finds it in herself to do such a thing. A demon lord who cannot stand to be alone due to fear of solitude has apparently gone out to play with her friends today, as usual.

skill.name: Gravitational Disintegration
skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.

abilities.name: Extraterrestrial Princess
abilities.description: Increases 35% of Skill DMG and 35% of Crit DMG.

744.name: 96d4dab
744.description:
"Complacency rots the soul……and I'll never want that to happen to me."
A spirit transformed from the priceless acoustic guitar made by the renowned luthier Antonio Stradivari. She is the guitarist of unparalleled renown in the genre of spirit music. She used to be a lady from an extremely affluent family. But as she loathes a lifestyle of material comfort without challenges and hardship, she grabbed a guitar and simply left home, without any knowledge of the world. As she led a life of a street performer who can barely put food on her table, she encountered Homer, who shares similar values and beliefs with her. The two have been partners ever since. It is said that their neighbors would hear the sounds of guitar duet from the run-down apartment they once dwelled from time to time and such stories have become legends... Not only that, she actually jammed with a saucepan once but the session ended up in a fight due to differences in their perceived musicality. She will probably never accept any offer for ensemble or group performance from now on.

skill.name: Resonating Eradication
skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies; decreases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.

abilities.name: Legendary Instrument
abilities.description: Increases 15% of DMG of all allies at the start of each wave.

745.name: 033a167
745.description:
"Come, let the roses of blood bloom."
A spirit transformed the beautiful princess and one of the true ancestors of vampires. She is the chief of the 108 clans of vampires with the lineage of true ancestors - an energetic girl who is most trusted by Count Dracula. Despite being a vampire, she is not affected by sunlight in anyway and can withstand direct exposure. Apparently she has used it as an excuse to go about all sorts of places to have fun using the excuse of going on missions. Not only that, since food in modern times are much richer in nutritional values, she apparently no longer has to drink blood for sustenance. But even so, one will find his life force secretly drained away if he ever gets careless. One should never let his/her guard down just because of her appearance as a bishojo. On a related note, her ability is "Bloody Create." It allows her to manipulate the iron in her blood to create all sorts of weapons and devices of torture as she wishes.

skill.name: Bloody Spiral
skill.description: Causa {value} de daño a los 2 rivales con menos PS. Los objetivos dañan un +{delay1} temporalmente.

abilities.name: Beautiful Princess of True Ancestor
abilities.description: Increases own level by 15.

746.name: 1e1d7de
746.description:
"Let me show you my secret techniques that men will never be able to imitate!"
A spirit transformed from a female jonin -a leader of all female ninjas. She is the mentor of Camellia and Peony and has been nicknamed as "The Dark Hunter" while serving as the Captain of the Exorcist Squad. Apart from her exceptional fighting techniques and her cool head, her "charisma" is the deadliest weapon in her arsenal. Just as her opponents become bewitched by her sensual charms, she would take them out with a sudden attack that came from nowhere. Consequently, male spirits have grown to develop a genuine fear of her ……Apparently she has been rather upset about the ineptitude of dames who do not know how to leverage their gifts as women.

skill.name: Ran‧Kachofugetsu
skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.

abilities.name: Huntress of the Dark
abilities.description: Increases 50% of Skill DMG at the start of the final wave.

747.name: c999b15
747.description:
"You have to defeat me first before you can claim to be the strongest!"
A spirit transformed from the famed odachi that has been passed down as a family heirloom; a great weapon that runs more than two meters in length. Anyone who is deemed worthy of wielding her must have proven his/her mettle as the true heir and master of the Yagyu Shinkage-ryu. As she embodies the honor of a prestigious martial family with profound history, she is well-mannered and gracious in her demeanors. But due to her absolute confidence in her own abilities and strengths, she would inadvertently perceive others in a condescending manner...The truth is, she is a dame who knows little of the ways of the world and whenever she gets called out on this fact, she would become infuriated. In fact, this whole incident wouldn't have happened if this wasn't brought up in conversation when she went on a blind date... She really has tons of energy as a young lady, that's for certain. On a side note, she almost had no experience in dealing with other famed swords and katanas. The only friend she gets along well is Kuji Kanesada, whom she often spars with.
[Event] Guild Conquest

skill.name: Edge of Destruction
skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.

abilities.name: Legacy of Yagyu Shinkage-ryu
abilities.description: Skill attacks increase 40% DMG taken by targets.

748.name: New Year Sunrise
748.description:
"Please look upon me all you like!"
A ghost only visible on New Year's Day, and widely believed to be extremely valuable. Bowing down before her beauty is said to ensure peace and tranquility for the year ahead. But, actually, contrary to popular belief, she's always wandering around here and there. It's just that no one takes any notice of her until New Year's Day. She's a pretty lonely ghost for the rest of the year, and craves more attention.

skill.name: New Year Sunrise
skill.description: Restore {value} HP to self, increase crit rate for a limited time {delay1}

abilities.name: 4496ee8
abilities.description: 3f201ff

749.name: Nyx
749.description:
"I'll paint the sky black so that everyone can sleep peacefully."
Original form. One of Greek mythology's original deities, and the goddess of night. She lives together with her good friend Hemera, the goddess of day.

skill.name: Eternal Night Veil
skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.

abilities.name: Ruler of Night
abilities.description: All divina allies take 10% less DMG.(only take effect once to the team)

abilities.name: Dark Affinity
abilities.description: Increases 15% of skill DMG by Divina team members at the start of each wave.

750.name: Snow Sprite
750.description:
"Hey, you! Come and play with me! You want a snowball fight? Mind if I use icicles? Tee hee... How about we build a snowman? Yippee!"
A child spirit who appears in snowy territories. The family of any who play with her are said to be blessed with good fortune for generations to come.

skill.name: Dance of Ice and Snow
skill.description: Causa {value} de daño al objetivo actual, con {probability} de congelarlos.

abilities.name: Snow Spirit's Frolic
abilities.description: Normal attacks have 7% chances of inflicting Freeze.

751.name: Obi Ceremony
751.description:
"You look like you've never tied an obi before!"
A spirit who embodies the traditional Japanese ceremony where a seven-year old girl puts on her first obi sash. She is rather precocious, believing herself to be an expert on all things sash-related, and she likes to lord it over less enlightened children. It is true that girls are often more mature than boys at that age, but considering herself a full-blown grown-up might be taking things too far.

skill.name: Alluring Aura
skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.

abilities.name: Shichi-Go-San Rite
abilities.description: Increases 15% of the EXP gained from battle.(only take effect once to the team)

abilities.name: Precocious Expert
abilities.description: Increases battle reward drop rate by 25%.(only take effect once to the team)

752.name: Hakama Ceremony
752.description:
"Ready, set, jump!"
A spirit who embodies the traditional Japanese ceremony where a five-year old boy dons his first hakama robe. Believing that his ceremony was getting overlooked in favor of all the other events in the Shichi-Go-San Children's Festival, he became determined to raise its profile. He's willing to do anything to get people to acknowledge the supreme importance of the hakama ceremony - even stepping on his close friends' toes. He usually apologizes for this afterwards, though.

skill.name: Dropkick
skill.description: Restores {value} HP to ally with the highest ATK,Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.

abilities.name: Prayer for Growth
abilities.description: Increases 40% of skill DMG of the 2 allies with highest ATK at the start of the final wave.

abilities.name: Not to be Outdone
abilities.description: Increases 40% of crit rate and increases 90% of crit DMG of skill targets at the same time.

753.name: Jack of Hearts
753.description:
"I would lay down my life in service of my Queen."
A dashing swordsman who serves the Queen of Hearts. Blessed with a heroic disposition and admirably egalitarian in his treatment of others, he's rather popular with the ladies. His background is somewhat shrouded in mystery, but that's a story for another time.

skill.name: Blinding Flash
skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.

abilities.name: Queen's Knight
abilities.description: All Divina team members deal 25% more DMG.(only take effect once to the team)

754.name: Kotofurunushi
754.description:
"Does the sound of the koto harp not cause your chest to swell?"
The Anima of a koto harp, who plays beautiful music. Her music heals those who listen to it, and she plays dutifully every day.

skill.name: Elegant Melody
skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies. Targets deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.

abilities.name: Centennial Tune
abilities.description: All Anima team members take 5% less DMG

abilities.description: Restores 5% HP to Anima team members at the start of each wave.

755.name: Arko
755.description:
"Name your target and I'll shoot it right down!"
The soul of Oberon's bow. The arrows fired from this magic-infused bow have never once failed to strike their target, but he only ever listens to what Oberon tells him to do.

skill.name: Bullseye
skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.

abilities.name: Faerie King's Magic Bow
abilities.description: Increases Combat Damage by 30%.

abilities.name: Oberon's Decree
abilities.description: Increases Attack Speed by 50% when 'Oberon' is present.

2182.name: Circus Elephant
2182.description:
"It's all about the circus! Anything else is irrelephant!"
The ghost of a well-trained circus elephant. She tends to make bad elephant jokes, especially when she gets excited. She's a bit clumsy, too, and steps on a few toes now and then.
[Event] Greatest Show On Earth

skill.name: Thousand-Ton Press
skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.

abilities.name: Elephantine Strength
abilities.description: Deals 22% more DMG.

2183.name: Human Cannon
2183.description:
"Here we gooooooooo!"
The ghost of a cannon that fires human cannonballs. A spring is used to propel the person into the air, as gunpowder explodes for effect. She says that, with enough force, a human can be shot across an entire continent, but her claim remains unverified.
[Event] Greatest Show On Earth

skill.name: Zero-Range Fire
skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.

abilities.name: Gunpowder Boost
abilities.description: Increases 6% of ATK speed of all allies.(only take effect once to the team)

2188.name: Chikamatsu Monzaemon
2188.description:
"What a glorious stage!"
The ghost of the great dramatist of Japanese joruri puppet theater and kabuki plays. He heard of a new and unusual form of entertainment called the circus, and, full of curiosity, rushed to see it. He was so greatly impressed with the dynamic flamboyance of the show that he left before it was over to start work on his next creation.
[Event] Greatest Show On Earth

skill.name: Love Suicide
skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.

abilities.name: Playwright Master
abilities.description: Increases 38% of skill DMG.

2184.name: Zeami Motokiyo
2184.description:
"A circus, eh? Hmm. Interesting."
When the ghost of this great Noh theater playwright and actor heard of this particular form of entertainment for the masses, she rushed to see it. She was especially impressed with the circus clowns, and was apparently inspired by the stark white and bright red of their makeup.
[Event] Greatest Show On Earth

skill.name: Fūshikaden
skill.description: Causa {value} de daño a todos los rivales, con {probability} de silenciarlos.

abilities.name: Yūgen Beauty
abilities.description: Reduces 4% of DMG dealt by all foes at the start of each wave.

2187.name: Lion Clown [Wild]
2187.description:
"Roooooooar!"
The ghost of a lion tamed by Harlequin. People originally thought that it was Löwe the Clown who had mastery over the beast, but it was always really Harlequin who was in control. It just goes to show what a truly skillful lion tamer Harlequin is.
[Event] Greatest Show On Earth

skill.name: Riot
skill.description: Causa {value} de daño a los rivales cercanos.

abilities.name: Beast's Instinct
abilities.description: When HP is 1/2 or less, Increases 42% of DMG dealt.

2193.name: Trick Pony
2193.description:
"Did you ever see a stunt like this?"
The ghost of a circus pony whose specialty is stunt-riding tricks. She and her rider are so in tune that there's never a slip-up no matter what tricky pose the rider attempts. She is devoted to practicing, and is fairly humble to boot. When it comes to the day of a show, however, she can become quite nervous and get a little out of control. But that's when her hours of practice kick in, and she always manages to give a flawless performance.
[Event] Greatest Show On Earth

skill.name: Phantom Ride
skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.

abilities.name: Perfect Stunt
abilities.description: Skill attacks increase target's ATK speed by 42%.

2194.name: Beast Tamer
2194.description:
"Someday... I'll do it someday...!"
A tamer of fierce animals, she is one of the newer members of the circus troupe. Her ability is undisputed, but she tends to be overshadowed by Löwe the Clown, and secretly considers her a rival. Perhaps this sort of competitive rivalry is really what's behind all of the circus troupe's successes?

skill.name: Wildebeest Migration
skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies. Targets take {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.

abilities.name: Competitive Spirit
abilities.description: All Phantasma team members deal 5% more DMG.

2195.name: Circus Trapeze
2195.description:
"Wheeeee!"
The Anima of a flying circus trapeze. Her breathtaking flights through the air are a featured attraction of the circus. But, truth be told, breakneak speeds are a little outside of her comfort zone, and she often feels quite nervous.
[Event] Greatest Show On Earth

skill.name: Jet Swing
skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.

abilities.name: Flying Trapeze
abilities.description: Increases 25% of ATK speed.

2189.name: Löwe the Clown
2189.description:
"Welcome to our great show!"
The new ringmaster of a circus company that travels all over the world. At first, she felt burdened by her new role, but after a certain incident, she experienced personal growth and began to embrace her destiny. Many believe that, at this rate, she may even surpass the great Harlequin one day.
[Event] Greatest Show On Earth

skill.name: Beast Menace
skill.description: Increases DMG dealt by all allies by {delay1} for a limited time.

abilities.name: New Ringmaster
abilities.description: Increases 18% of max HP of all allies.

2185.name: Harlequin
2185.description:
"I'm looking forward to seeing the circus of this new era!"
The ghost of the ringmaster of a circus company that travels all over the world. Earlier in her career, she was an unparalleled clown and lion tamer and a brilliant performer in her own right. She led her circus troupe for many years, but then finally stepped down after finding a talented successor.
[Event] Greatest Show On Earth

skill.name: Beast Clutches
